umayyad.gloss: the first dynasty of Arab caliphs whose capital was Damascus

umbellales.gloss: plants having umbels or corymbs of uniovulate flowers

umbellifer.gloss: any of numerous aromatic herbs of the family Umbelliferae

umbelliferous plant.gloss: any of numerous aromatic herbs of the family Umbelliferae

umbellularia.gloss: aromatic evergreen trees of Pacific coast

umber.gloss: a medium brown to dark-brown color

umbilical.gloss: membranous duct connecting the fetus with the placenta

umbilical cord.gloss: membranous duct connecting the fetus with the placenta

umbilical hernia.gloss: protrusion of the intestine and omentum through a hernia in the abdominal wall near the navel

umbilical vein.gloss: a vein in the umbilical cord

umbilical vesicle.gloss: membranous structure that functions as the circulatory system in mammalian embryos until the heart becomes functional

umbilicus.gloss: a scar where the umbilical cord was attached

umbrage.gloss: a feeling of anger caused by being offended

umbrella arum.gloss: foul-smelling somewhat fleshy tropical plant of southeastern Asia cultivated for its edible corms or in the greenhouse for its large leaves and showy dark red spathe surrounding a large spadix

umbrella bird.gloss: black tropical American bird having a large overhanging crest and long feathered wattle

umbrella fern.gloss: large Australasian fern with fanlike repeatedly forked fronds

umbrella magnolia.gloss: small deciduous tree of eastern North America having creamy white flowers and large leaves in formations like umbrellas at the ends of branches

umbrella pine.gloss: medium-sized two-needled pine of southern Europe having a spreading crown

umbrella plant.gloss: rhizomatous perennial herb with large dramatic peltate leaves and white to bright pink flowers in round heads on leafless stems
late blooming perennial plant of shale barrens of Virginia having flowers in flat-topped clusters
African sedge widely cultivated as an ornamental water plant for its terminal umbrellalike cluster of slender grasslike leaves

umbrella tree.gloss: erect evergreen shrub or small tree of Australia and northern New Guinea having palmately compound leaves
small deciduous tree of eastern North America having creamy white flowers and large leaves in formations like umbrellas at the ends of branches

umbrina roncador.gloss: a fish of the Pacific coast of North America

umma.gloss: the Muslim community or people, considered to extend from Mauritania to Pakistan
